```{r setup}
#| include: false

# Charger les packages
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(here)

# Charger et pr√©parer les donn√©es
df <- read_csv(here("data", "raw", "employee_reviews.csv"), show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  janitor::clean_names()

# Corrections des noms de colonnes
df <- df %>%
  rename(
    career_opportunities_stars = carrer_opportunities_stars,
    senior_management_stars = senior_mangemnet_stars
  )

# Conversion en num√©rique
stars_columns <- c("work_balance_stars", "culture_values_stars", 
                   "career_opportunities_stars", "comp_benefit_stars", 
                   "senior_management_stars")

for(col in stars_columns) {
  if(col %in% names(df)) {
    df[[col]] <- as.numeric(as.character(df[[col]]))
  }
}

# Extraire l'ann√©e
df <- df %>%
  mutate(
    review_year = case_when(
      str_detect(dates, "\\d{4}") ~ as.numeric(str_extract(dates, "\\d{4}")),
      TRUE ~ NA_real_
    )
  )

# Calculer les statistiques globales
overall_stats <- df %>%
  summarise(
    total_reviews = n(),
    companies = n_distinct(company),
    avg_rating = mean(overall_ratings, na.rm = TRUE),
    pct_positive = mean(overall_ratings >= 4, na.rm = TRUE) * 100
  )

company_stats <- df %>%
  group_by(company) %>%
  summarise(
    n_avis = n(),
    note_moyenne = mean(overall_ratings, na.rm = TRUE),
    ecart_type = sd(overall_ratings, na.rm = TRUE),
    .groups = "drop"
  ) %>%
  arrange(desc(note_moyenne))
```

# 4. Analyse Multi-Dimensionnelle {.section-title background-color="#0f172a"}

## Les 5 Piliers de la Satisfaction

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## üé≠ Les 5 Dimensions √âvalu√©es {.smaller}

```{r dimensions-ranking}
#| echo: false

dimension_stats <- df %>%
  select(all_of(stars_columns)) %>%
  pivot_longer(everything(), names_to = "dimension", values_to = "rating") %>%
  mutate(
    dimension = case_when(
      dimension == "work_balance_stars" ~ "Work-Life Balance",
      dimension == "culture_values_stars" ~ "Culture & Values",
      dimension == "career_opportunities_stars" ~ "Career Opportunities",
      dimension == "comp_benefit_stars" ~ "Compensation & Benefits",
      dimension == "senior_management_stars" ~ "Senior Management"
    )
  ) %>%
  group_by(dimension) %>%
  summarise(
    moyenne = mean(rating, na.rm = TRUE),
    mediane = median(rating, na.rm = TRUE),
    observations = sum(!is.na(rating)),
    .groups = "drop"
  ) %>%
  arrange(desc(moyenne)) %>%
  mutate(
    rang = row_number(),
    note_format = paste0(round(moyenne, 2), " / 5")
  )

dimension_stats %>%
  select(
    `Rang` = rang,
    `Dimension` = dimension,
    `Moyenne` = note_format,
    `M√©diane` = mediane,
    `Observations` = observations
  ) %>%
  kbl(align = c("c", "l", "c", "c", "r")) %>%
  kable_styling(
    bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"),
    full_width = FALSE,
    font_size = 22
  ) %>%
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE, color = "white", background = "#1e3a8a") %>%
  row_spec(1, bold = TRUE, background = "#22c55e", color = "white") %>%
  row_spec(5, bold = TRUE, background = "#ef4444", color = "white")
```

## üìä Tendances par Entreprise {.smaller}

```{r trend-analysis}
#| echo: false

trend_summary <- yearly_by_company %>%
  group_by(company) %>%
  arrange(review_year) %>%
  summarise(
    evolution = last(note_moyenne) - first(note_moyenne),
    tendance = ifelse(evolution > 0, "‚ÜóÔ∏è Am√©lioration", "‚ÜòÔ∏è D√©gradation"),
    note_2008 = first(note_moyenne),
    note_2018 = last(note_moyenne),
    .groups = "drop"
  ) %>%
  arrange(desc(evolution)) %>%
  mutate(
    evolution_format = paste0(ifelse(evolution > 0, "+", ""), round(evolution, 2)),
    note_2008 = round(note_2008, 2),
    note_2018 = round(note_2018, 2)
  )

trend_summary %>%
  select(
    `Entreprise` = company,
    `2008` = note_2008,
    `2018` = note_2018,
    `√âvolution` = evolution_format,
    `Tendance` = tendance
  ) %>%
  kbl(align = c("l", "c", "c", "c", "l")) %>%
  kable_styling(
    bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"),
    full_width = FALSE,
    font_size = 22
  ) %>%
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE, color = "white", background = "#1e3a8a") %>%
  row_spec(which(trend_summary$evolution > 0.3), background = "#dcfce7") %>%
  row_spec(which(trend_summary$evolution < 0), background = "#fee2e2")
```

::: {.callout-tip icon="false"}

-   **Amazon** : Redressement constant (+0.49 pts)
